task.summary:
Current Update: Kafka & Spring Scheduler implemented. Note: Kafka class is commented in code as I've not provided Kafka server URL.
Future Update: Kafka URL and Scheduler modification to submit assignment work.

Update: Kafka URL and Scheduler have been modified for assignment2 submission.
Following emails have been sent to professor for grading my work:
nakul@gmail.com:010090730:Poll Result[iOS=0,Android=0] vakulsharma@gmail.com:010090730:Poll Result[Yes=8,No=4] vakulsharma@gmail.com:010090730:Poll Result[iOS=2,Android=12] prateek@clct.com:010090730:Poll Result[Yes=0,No=3] nakulsharma06@gmail.com:010090730:Poll Result[iOS=8,Android=3] nakulsharma06@gmail.com:010090730:Poll Result[Yes=8,No=1]
Update: 1. Changed @Scheduler (fixedRate=5000) to @Scheduler (fixedRate=300000) 2. Removed old version of gradle from the project.
